DOC.brief_summary: 1 . Briefly describe purpose protocol : This study design evaluate effectiveness educational training video topic health literacy medical student . 2 . Briefly summarize participant recruit : OHSU medical student attend mandatory training topic health literacy 1st 2nd year medical school invite participate study . 3 . Briefly describe procedure subject undergo : Completion short self-administered anonymous survey view 23-minute video health literacy . 4 . If applicable , briefly describe survey/interview instrument use : A 12-item pre-test questionnaire 13-item post-test questionnaire design assess individual ' knowledge health literacy , intend clinical practice respect health literacy . 5 . If clinical trial use experimental drug and/or device , approve drug and/or device use unapproved purpose , briefly describe drug and/or device : n/a 6 . Briefly describe data analyze address purpose protocol : Demographics response individual item report frequency percentage within sample . The investigator use chi-square analysis stratify response demographic group t-tests measure possible change time .
DOC.brief_title: Use Training Video Teach Medical Students About Health Literacy
